# Methods

```{r}
english_negation <- get_utterances(language = "eng", age = c(20,24), role = "Target_Child")


count_types <- function(string){
  n <- nlevels(as.factor(unlist(strsplit(string, " "))))
  return(n)
}

english_negation <-
  english_negation %>%
  filter(grepl('^no | no | no$|^not | not | not$|n\'t', gloss)) %>%
  filter(!grepl('not yet transcribed need to fix', gloss)) %>%
  mutate(can = grepl('^can | can | can$|cannot|can\'t', gloss)) %>%
  mutate(do = grepl('^do | do | do$|don\'t', gloss)) %>%
  mutate(n_types = unlist(lapply(gloss, count_types))) %>%
  mutate(type_token_ratio = n_types/num_tokens)




write.csv(english_negation, file="raw_data/eng_negation_undertwo.csv")
```
